text: Hillsong Church, commonly known as Hillsong, is a very large church in Sydney. According to the church, over 35,000 people attend services each week. It also has churches in Brisbane, London, Kiev, Cape Town, Stockholm, Paris, Moscow and New York City. The churches are pastored by senior pastor Brian Houston. Hillsong is also well known for their worship music CDs and DVDs. ==References== Category:Churches Category:Buildings and structures in Sydney
title: Hillsong Church
